acupoint.standard_location: 在手背，第1、2掌骨间，当第2掌骨桡侧的中点处
acupoint.standard_location_en: On the dorsum of the hand, between the 1st and 2nd metacarpal bones, at the midpoint of the 2nd metacarpal bone on the radial side
acupoint.simple_method: 拇指、食指并拢，虎口处肌肉隆起最高点
acupoint.simple_method_en: Press thumb and index finger together. The point is at the highest bulge of muscle in the web space.
acupoint.anatomical: 第一骨间背侧肌中；有手背静脉网，桡动脉从手背穿向手掌；布有桡神经浅支
functions: 疏风解表 (dispel wind, release exterior)
镇静止痛 (calm and relieve pain)
